posts.post_content:
Im continuing the journey of collecting Old Judge Detroit Wolverines: 

I have 9 and would love to add more, if anyone is looking to move one, shoot me a message.
Thanks to this thread, I was able to pick up a couple low end Detroit Wolverines. Keep em, coming. Im buying all possible to build my set.
periodic bump. Looking for poses from just about all Detroit players

I’m up to 18 Detroit old judge poses thanks to this community. 
If anyone is open to selling I’m buying as I pursue the subset

Periodic post update. 
19 and counting. I’m on a life long mission (that I’ll never complete but will have fun trying) to collect all the Detroit Wolverine cards and cabinets. 

I’m looking to buy or trade for them
